document.full_text: germany's infineon raised its outlook for the full year after a strong second quarter and thanks to high order levels but cautioned that japan remained a potential risk to supplies and production.
document.title: infineon hikes full year outlook, japan remains risky
lines_and_colors: germany's infineon raised its outlook for the full year after a strong second quarter and thanks to high order levels but cautioned that japan remained a potential risk to supplies and production.
